pages.title: Modular Beehive Core
pages.text: The controller of the Modular Beehive multiblock, a 3x3x3 cube structure.$(br)You can replace any Beehive Structure Box with functional part to improve the beehive.$(br)Modular Beehive doesn't allow shared blocks.

pages.title: Features
pages.text: Modular Beehive has a built-in simulate upgrade, so bees won't come out of the hive.$(br)Bees won't breed and do in-world transformation recipes in modular beehive to save performance, instead they will produce combs and honey at incredible speed with upgrades.
